scenario_text.value: Did you hear something just now?!
Yeah? Let’s check it out, but be careful.

YIKES! Stop, lemme go! My meat’s all stringy,
you’d hate it!

Wait, what? Aren’t you all friends of Lady
Miu?

You’re the one we met last time we came here,
aren’t you? I’m so glad you’re safe!
Did, did you come here to save me...?

Yep, that’s right. You’re gonna be okay! Come
with us, we’ll treat your wounds.
